description.value:
Element air, earth; Type utility (Sp); Level 9; Burn 0
Prerequisite magnetic infusion, magnetism
Saving Throw none; SR no

You can repel or attract metal objects in a vast line with a magnetism so strong that there is no hope of escaping. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oeemcnfjod9zd7my]{Repel Metal or Stone}, except only for metal objects, and you can also pull the objects toward you instead of pushing them away. The effect lasts for 1 round, and the pulling version of the effect canâ€™t pull objects into the air unless they are already airborne.

You can accept 1 point of burn to increase the duration to 1 round per kineticist level you have.
